title: PDM Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, shares of Piedmont Office Realty Trust Inc (Symbol: PDM) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $19.80, changing hands as high as $19.84 per share. Piedmont Office Realty Trust Inc shares are currently trading trading flat on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of PDM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, PDM's low point in its 52 week range is $16.435 per share, with $21.40 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $19.80.
